parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: PatchStatuses
parameters.description: The status of the patches that you want to query. If you do not set this parameter, patches are not filtered.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the instance whose patches you want to query resides.
